title: Samuel Sekuritas Indonesia Buy Shares of Sentul City Tbk
body: Samuel Sekuritas Indonesia acquired shares of Sentul City Tbk in a buy transaction. The transaction involved 2,162,984,400 units at a price of IDR 142 per share, for a total value of IDR 2,162,984,400. This increased their holdings from 6,655,276,554 to 8,818,260,954 shares. The purpose of this transaction was a Reverse Repo.

title: PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk Shareholder Azara Alpina Sdn Bhd Reports New Transaction
body: Azara Alpina Sdn Bhd has restructured its share ownership in PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk. The transaction involved the transfer of 12,738,987,714 shares, resulting in the company's holding decreasing from 12,738,987,714 shares to 0 shares. The transaction was executed on December 17, 2025, with an indicative price of IDR 1,100 per share. This restructuring aims to reorganize the shareholding structure of the company.

title: Robin Sunyoto Buys Shares of PT Hero Global Investment Tbk
body: Robin Sunyoto acquired 25,000 shares of PT Hero Global Investment Tbk (HGII.JK) at IDR 151 per share for investment purposes. This transaction increased his total holdings from 13,275,000 to 13,300,000 shares. The purchase signifies continued confidence in the company by the shareholder.

title: PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk Shareholder Tan Yu Wei Reports New Transaction
body: Tan Yu Wei, a shareholder of PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk (MDIY.JK), has restructured share ownership. The transaction involved the transfer of shares with a reported value of IDR 666,081,444. Following this, Tan Yu Wei's holdings increased from 756,588,756 shares to 1,422,670,200 shares. The purpose stated for this transaction is to restructure share ownership.

title: Sight Investment Company Pte Limited Buy Shares of PT Siloam International Hospitals Tbk
body: Sight Investment Company Pte Limited acquired 66,500,000 shares of PT Siloam International Hospitals Tbk (SILO.JK) for an undisclosed total amount, with the transaction occurring at an average price of IDR 2,400 per share. This purchase increases their holdings from 8,251,973,832 shares to 8,318,473,832 shares, representing a net increase of 66,500,000 shares. The stated purpose of this transaction is investment. This acquisition signifies continued confidence in SILO.JK's market position and future prospects by Sight Investment Company Pte Limited.

title: PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk Shareholder Mdih (Singapore) Pte. Ltd. Reports New Transaction
body: Mdih (Singapore) Pte. Ltd. has reported a transaction concerning PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk, aimed at restructuring share ownership. The transaction involved an amount of IDR 5,201,816,184, with a representative price of IDR 1,100 per share. Following this action, Mdih (Singapore) Pte. Ltd.'s holdings increased from 3,695,743,216 shares to 8,897,559,400 shares, indicating a significant change in its ownership stake in the company.

title: PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk Shareholder Suncoast Financial Investments Ltd Reports New Transaction
body: Suncoast Financial Investments Ltd has restructured its share ownership in PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk (MDIY.JK). The transaction involved a change in holdings from 1,811,234,734 shares to 5,834,207,200 shares, indicating a significant increase in ownership. The reported transaction value is IDR 4,022,972,466, with a representative price of IDR 1,100 per share. This restructuring aims to optimize the company's share ownership structure.

title: PT Hotel Fitra International Tbk Bought Shares of PT Hotel Fitra International Tbk
body: On December 12, 2025, PT Hotel Fitra International Tbk acquired 6,270,000,000 shares of the company at IDR 105 per share, for a total transaction value of IDR 627,000,000. This acquisition increased the company's holdings from 0 to 6,270,000,000 shares. The purpose of this transaction was acquisition.

title: Tan Yu Yeh Others Transaction of PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk
body: Tan Yu Yeh others shares of PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk (MDIY.JK) at approximately IDR  1.100. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Ong Chu Jin Adrian Others Transaction of PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk
body: Ong Chu Jin Adrian others shares of PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk (MDIY.JK) at approximately IDR  1.100. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Henry Liem Sell Transaction of Argha Karya Prima Ind. Tbk
body: Henry Liem sell shares of Argha Karya Prima Ind. Tbk (AKPI.JK) at approximately IDR  565. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Harimas Tunggal Perkasa Sell Transaction of PT Impack Pratama Industri Tbk
body: Harimas Tunggal Perkasa sell shares of PT Impack Pratama Industri Tbk (IMPC.JK) at approximately IDR  2.992. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Promosi Desa Digital Sell Transaction of PT Haloni Jane Tbk
body: Promosi Desa Digital sell shares of PT Haloni Jane Tbk (HALO.JK) at approximately IDR  20. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.
